channel.title: anti-racism on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in anti-racism on David John Baker

item.title: Building Anti-Racism and Music Science Resources
item.description: Last week the panel discussion from last year’s SMPC was published in Auditory Perception and Cognition.

item.title: How Can Music Science Be More Socially Just?
item.description: Today we submitted the transcript of the panel that the Society for Music and Perception’s Anti Racism and Equity Committee organized at last summer’s conference in Portland, Oregon.
